abstract: EMC is selling a $150 million stake in its VMware software subsidiary to networking hardware maker Cisco Systems. The deal will give Cisco a 1.6 percent stake in VMware and comes about two weeks after Intel bought a 2.5 percent stake in the company for $218.5 million.
lead_paragraph: EMC is selling a $150 million stake in its VMware software subsidiary to networking hardware maker Cisco Systems. The deal will give Cisco a 1.6 percent stake in VMware and comes about two weeks after Intel bought a 2.5 percent stake in the company for $218.5 million.

headline.main: Cisco Takes Stake in VMware Before I.P.O.
